name: Fruit Jelly Match3 - Link Jam
description:
Fruit Jelly Match3 - Link Jam puzzle game that is colorful and easy to play!
Features :
With over 200 match-3 puzzle games and many interesting levels
Collect treasures on the island with many fruits
Easy to play but hard to become a Fruits legend and reach the 3 stars for each level
Colorful fruits and lovely with emotion and personality
Full HD graphics, dynamic sound, super-cute character
